name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: My Digital Health - Jitsi Desktop Streamer

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension that allows you to stream your desktop into meetings with Jitsi Meet and Jitsi Videobridge.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Screen sharing for My Digital Health video chat. Installing this extension will allow you to share your screen with another user which can be helpful when sharing content or troubleshooting technical issues. Without this extension screen sharing will be disabled. This extension is developed only for use with the My Digital Health platform.
